# Sample Service Agreement for Testing

This Service Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of January 1, 2025 between Test Client Corp. ("Client") and Test Provider Inc. ("Provider").

## 1. Services
Provider shall provide software development services as requested by Client.

## 2. Payment
Client shall pay Provider $5,000 per month, due within 30 days of invoice.

## 3. Term
This Agreement shall continue for one year and automatically renew unless terminated.

## 4. Termination
Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

## 5. Intellectual Property
All work product shall be owned by Client upon payment.

## 6. Confidentiality
Both parties shall maintain confidentiality of proprietary information.

## 7. Limitation of Liability
Neither party's liability shall exceed the fees paid in the prior 12 months.

## 8. Governing Law
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of Delaware.
